# [Interview #811: JordanCon 2012 - Terez, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=811#4)

#### Question

Has Verin ever been to the 'Finns or through the Rhuidean rings?

#### Maria Simons

Not that I know of.
